FAQs

Who was Robin Williams?

Robin Williams was an American actor, comedian, born on 21 July, 1951 in Chicago, Illinois, United States.

When did Robin Williams pass away?

Robin Williams passed away on August 11, 2014.

How old was Robin Williams at the time of death?

Robin Williams was 9 years old when he passed away.

How tall was Robin Williams?

Robin Williams was 5 feet 6 inches (1.70 m).
